title: Boards response bug
body:
strangely, while typing, if you are at the end of the line of text where the text attempts to cross into the next line and apply punctuation such as "," or ";"  , you can then not input keys such as back space and space, making corrections and additions difficult

although this is a minor issue, it was roughly 30 minutes of frustration to figure out what was wrong with it while making a response.  It was not triggered by problems with hardware, the keys still functioned in other tabs and applications

Hopefully this will help to prevent some frustrations in the future ^^

replies.body: I'm not sure what you mean. Can you provide exact steps to reproduce this?

for example, if I am responding to this post and continue to type words until I reach the end of the line, yada yada until the line is filled as so;

it would not allow me to use space or backspace, however, for some reason this did not occur this time.  Whether it was a fluke, I do not know.  Perhaps it was simply a formatting problem or a stuck key, but when it happened, I had to select and cut my text in order to do corrections

so, it's minor, could even just be a problem on my part

strangely, the length of the lines seems to vary, as so was at the end of the line previously and is now not
